About MakeItSo

MAKEITSO is a bare startup theme with a minimum of styling bases on some sensible defaults. These defaults are for you to change or adapt. It is advised to keep the base scss partials, as the selectors and css cascade are a good basis for implementing your design with.

MAKEITSO is responsive, is progressively enhanced and is built mobile first.

A base project setup

MAKEITSO strives to not give you unneeded and excessive markup, CSS styles and classes or pre-made design patterns.

Some important details:

  • Normalize.css is used as a default to align browsers' rendering appearrance and positioning.
  • CSS Grid is used to layout the main inner-wrap class elements. See _theme.scss for examples
  • Probably the most opinionated (but small) piece of functionality in this project is the mobile menu toggle functionality on small screens in combination with the search block. If you don't like it, take it out. It's fairly easy and a small effort: remove the lines of code in source/js/custom.js
